abstract: The latest round of sanctions by Washington and the European Union ordered companies to cut off help to Russian oil exploration in the Arctic.
snippet: The latest round of sanctions by Washington and the European Union ordered companies to cut off help to Russian oil exploration in the Arctic.
lead_paragraph: Exxon Mobil announced on Friday that it was winding down its $700 million exploration in Russia’s Kara Sea, the first major sign that Western sanctions are biting into the company’s ambitious plans to explore for oil and gas in the Arctic Ocean.

headline.main: Exxon Halts Oil Drilling in Waters of Russia
headline.print_headline: Exxon Halts Oil Drilling in Waters of Russia
